endpoints.description: Submit a new insurance claim for processing.
Retrieve the current status of an existing insurance claim.
Update details of an existing insurance claim.
Remove an insurance claim from the system.
Upload required documents for an insurance claim.
Retrieve a list of available insurance policies.
Access the processing history of a specific claim.
Validate the provided information for accuracy before submission.
Generate reports on claim processing trends and metrics.
Submit feedback related to the insurance claim process.
